import ColumnActions from './ColumnActions?dev-site-example';

# Column Actions

### Description

This example demonstrates a [Worklist Data Grid](/components/cerner-terra-framework-docs/data-grid/worklist-data-grid/about) that supports Column Actions feature.

#### Required Properties

The **[action](/components/cerner-terra-framework-docs/data-grid/worklist-data-grid/about#column) property** requires the following properties:

* **label** property: The label for the action button. 
* **onClick** callback property: When the user clicks on an action button, this callback is requested.
